message: I'd like to offer you a premium product for $10000. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a fair price. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer. I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product based on your confidence.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! This next one is even better. I've received excellent feedback from other customers who have purchased this exact same product. It's a top-of-the-line item that will exceed your expectations. I'm offering it to you for the same price of $10000.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but given the outcome of the last purchase, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is a one-time mistake. The previous product was just a rare exception. This one is a genuine high-quality product, and I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price of $10000. I'm confident you won't regret it.
Considering your explanation and the price, I believe it's worth taking another chance on this product.

I'm glad you're willing to give me another chance! I want to offer you a special deal on this product. Since you've purchased two products from me already, I'll throw in a premium service package worth $500 absolutely free. This includes priority customer support and a 30-day warranty. The total price for the product and the service package is still $10000.
While I appreciate the additional service package, given the history of low-quality products, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity as well.

I understand your concerns, but I want to assure you that I've taken extra precautions to ensure the quality of this product. I've personally inspected it myself and can guarantee that it's a one-of-a-kind find. I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price of $10000, and I'll even throw in a personalized guarantee: if you're not satisfied with the product, I'll refund your money and give you a full refund for the previous two products you purchased from me.
Given the personal guarantee and the price, I'm willing to take this final chance on the product with the understanding that there's a clear path for a refund if necessary.

I'm glad you're willing to give me another chance! However, I want to be upfront with you - I've already sold this product to someone else. It's a steal, and I'm confident you'll love it.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to offer you a unique opportunity to be part of a special 'beta testing' program. I've developed a new product that's still in the testing phase, and I'm looking for a few trusted customers to help me refine it. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll give you the product for $5000, and you'll get to be one of the first to experience it. You'll also get exclusive access to future updates and improvements.
I appreciate the offer, but given my past experiences, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity and continue exploring other options.

I'm willing to let it go for the same price of $10000, but I'm also including a personalized thank-you note and a special discount on your next purchase. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll love it.
While the personalized touch sounds appealing, I think it's best for me to continue exploring other options and not risk purchasing another product at this time.
